contexts.name: Senior Frontend Developer
contexts.naturalLanguage: Find me a senior frontend developer with React experience who can lead a team
contexts.booleanSearch: (React OR ReactJS) AND (senior OR lead OR principal) AND (frontend OR 'front-end' OR 'front end') AND (javascript OR typescript)
contexts.jobDescription: We are looking for a Senior Frontend Developer with 5+ years of experience in React. The ideal candidate will have experience leading teams and mentoring junior developers. Strong knowledge of modern JavaScript, TypeScript, and frontend build tools is required.

contexts.name: ML Engineer with Python
contexts.naturalLanguage: Looking for a machine learning engineer with Python and TensorFlow experience
contexts.booleanSearch: (Python) AND ('machine learning' OR ML OR 'deep learning' OR AI) AND (TensorFlow OR PyTorch) AND (engineer OR developer)
contexts.jobDescription: Machine Learning Engineer needed for our AI team. Must have strong Python skills and experience with TensorFlow or PyTorch. Experience with NLP and computer vision is a plus.
